item.title: Fun with xpath
item.description: I had fun today at work when I had to design a program that allows users to select nodes with xPath but keep the same hierarchical structure as the original xml file. The result with tests is available on github. For instance, the following xPath /persons/person[@age > 18]/project[@language = 'java'], would select the lines highlighted in the file below : Normal xPath result would be a list of nodes like that
